summary: 3D avatar creator app with enhanced 3D look and additional customization options.
architectural_notes: Avatar Creator changes must be isolated to avoid impacting other features/CRUD.

existing_features.title: Enhance the Avatar Creator preview to look more 3D by improving depth, shading, and lighting of the avatar parts in the existing preview component without changing any other modules or backend CRUD flows.

Add more Avatar Creator customization options by expanding the selectable variants for existing categories (head, hair, body, pants, headwear, shoes) while keeping the saved AvatarConfig schema exactly the same.

new_feature_requests.summary: Enhance Avatar Creator to look more 3D and add more customization options (focused changes; do not impact other features/CRUD).

projectName: Improve Avatar Creator 3D look and add more customization options (focused changes only)
